StickMe Note %1$s is a simple notepad.\nThis app is a easy and fast notes app. %1$s …
Downloading … New version of app is downloading
ProfileFragment N Untitled Your note saved successfully Are you sure you want to delete this note? Yes No Save Discard Cancel Are you sure you want to save the new note?
<font color=%1$s>StickMe</font> <font color=#FA8704>Note</font>
Update Available A new version of this app is available Update now Later Permission Denied Without this permission the app is unable to download new and install new version.Are you sure you want to deny this permission? I\'m sure Retry We cannot show your runtime permission dialog box. Please pass this permission to us from the Setting->Apps->StickMe Note->Permissions->Files and media->Allow access OK An error occurred An error occurred during %1$s Your client does not have permission to access the google services
Password cannot be empty %1$s cannot be empty Enter a valid %1$s Password length should 8 or above Password confirmation doesn\'t match password Enter your password to send verification link to new email: SignIn again to send verification link to new email: A verification link send has now been sent to your new email Password reset link successfully sent to your email
general_theme account_info account_edit account_verify account_logout Your login as %1$s Verification link send to your email,Check your inbox! Logout Are you sure you want to logout?\nCloud saving will stop after logout You\'re not login Click to login Warning We couldn\'t do the last cloud sync\nAre you sure you want to log out without sync?
Welcome, Sync in progress … Last sync: %1$s Version: %1$s %2$s %1$d selected Are you sure you want to delete %1$s notes? A text message with a verification code has now been sent to your phone number Send notes to:
